# init(bytes:)

**Initializer**

Creates a 24-bit signed integer value from the specified bytes.

## Declaration

```swift
init(bytes: (UInt8, UInt8, UInt8))
```

## Parameters

- **bytes**: The bytes that define the value.

## Initializers

- **init()**: Creates a 24-but signed integer value.
title: init(bytes:)
